description: Kanazawa taking care of the forest where Ash`s Hawlucha was the champion of near the Shala Gym and he had been acquainted with it for a long time. Kanazawa believed that it just came to the forest to test his skills. When Ash`s Hawlucha decided to leave the forest, Kanazawa gave it his blessing and hoped he would have even more passionate battles.
name: Kanazawa
